title: At what age would you say its "okay" to be sexually active?
body:
By that I don't mean what people would say "messing around" i mean banging. I mean.... intercourse. 

Serious question. Want gd's opinions. I always figured teens in general would be kinda hit or miss as to what age they start doing things. I would say 16 minimum, but 17+ average. I know back in the day people didn't have sex that young ( I don't think)

What about your opinions?

edit: No, not a perv. Just wondering people's opinions on this? I Know someone will say that.
